summary: A retex of the glaciers in the game.
descriptionHtml:
Just did a new Ice Replacer mod with very high quality textures and parallax mapping check it out here - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5628

Replaced the old glacier texture with a new one. If you have any suggestions for it, please use the comments, all feedback is appreciated.

Install - Just drag the \"textures\" folder into your Skyrim/Data folder.

Version 1.2 - Fixed the watermark issue.
author: Osmodius
